channel.title: ActivityTracker - Step Counter for iPhone
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
My latest app (ActivityTracker) is an iPhone pedometer app that does use the M processor from iPhone 5s or newer so it doesn't drain the battery by firing the GPS and also tracks steps in-doors.
The app can import all historical data from the Health app so the user will have it's entire history from day one.
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/step-counter-pedometer-by/id993667592?ls=1&mt=8 http://activitytrackerapp.com
I look forward for your feedback.
Cheers

item.title: ActivityTracker - Step Counter for iPhone
item.dc:creator: Cosmin
item.description:
Hi everyone,

My latest app (ActivityTracker) is an iPhone pedometer app that does use the M processor from iPhone 5s or newer so it doesn’t drain the battery by firing the GPS and also tracks steps in-doors.

The app can import all historical data from the Health app so the user will have it’s entire history from day one.

App Store

ActivityTracker Pedometer on the App Store

Read reviews, compare customer ratings, see screenshots, and learn more about ActivityTracker Pedometer. Download ActivityTracker Pedometer and enjoy it on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch.


http://activitytrackerapp.com

I look forward for your feedback.

Cheers
